DOC.brief_summary: This study describe the effect of partial neuromuscular blockade of rocuronium on the acute hypoxic ventilatory response in patients with OSA before and after 3 month of CPAP treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Rocuronium on the Acute Hypoxic Ventilatory Response in Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: Male with diagnosed moderate OSA (AHI 1530), untreated, but planned for CPAP treatment. Healthy except for OSA and well controlled tablet treated hypertension where the treatment has not been changed during the last 3 month. None smokers. 1870 years old. BMI <35.
